resources.string: Novi lični API pristupni bon
Bon daje drugim osobama dozvolu za korištenje Vašeg računa.
Pažljivo odaberite šta je dozvoljeno učiniti u Vaše ime.
Opis bona
Dakle, zapamtite čemu služi ovaj bon
Šta bon može učiniti u Vaše ime:
Bon će omogućiti pristup Vašem računu. NEMOJTE to dijeliti ni s kim!
Pobrinite se da odmah kopirate svoj novi bon za lični pristup. Nećete ga više moći vidjeti!

string.name: preferenceRead
string.comment:
In the context of an authentication token, this is a setting that gives a third-party app permission to view the user's preferences.
There is a separate setting to let applications write (edit) preferences.

resources.string: Pročitajte preference

string.name: preferenceWrite
string.comment:
In the context of an authentication token, this is a setting that gives a third-party app permission to edit/change the user's preferences.
There is a separate setting to let applications only read preferences, but not to write (edit) them.

resources.string: Napišite preference

string.name: emailRead
string.comment: In the context of an authentication token, this is a setting that gives a third-party app permission to view the user's registered email address.

resources.string: Pročitajte adresu e-pošte

string.name: challengeRead
string.comment:
In the context of an authentication token, this is a setting that gives a third-party app permission to view game challenges from other players.
There is a separate setting to let applications send, accept or reject challenges.

resources.string: Pročitajte dolazne izazove

string.name: challengeWrite
string.comment:
challengeWrite
In the context of an authentication token, a setting that permits third party software to send, accept and reject challenges on behalf of the player.

resources.string: Napišite dolazne izazove
Kreirajte mnogo igara odjednom za druge igrače

string.name: studyRead
string.comment: Gives permission to third-party software to *read* information that already exists. However it won't be able to write (create) private studies or broadcasts.

resources.string: Čitajte privatne studije i emisije

string.name: studyWrite
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting that enables third party software to create, update or delete studies and broadcasts.

resources.string: Kreirajte, ažurirajte, brišite studije i emisije

string.name: tournamentWrite
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting that permits third party software to create, update or delete studies and join tournaments.

resources.string: Kreirajte, ažurirajte i pridružite se turnirima

string.name: racerWrite
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third party software to create, and join puzzle races (this is for the activity/minigame Puzzle Racer: https://lichess.org/racer)

resources.string: Kreirajte i pridružite se utrkama u problemima

string.name: puzzleRead
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third-party software to view the user's puzzle solving history.

resources.string: Pročitajte aktivnost u vezi s problemima

string.name: teamRead
string.comment: Gives permission to third-party software to *read* information that already exists. However it won't be able to write (create) private studies or broadcasts.

resources.string: Pročitajte informacije o privatnom timu

string.name: teamWrite
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting that permits the third party software to join or leave teams on your behalf.

resources.string: Pridružite se timu, napustite ga i upravljajte njim
Upravljajte timovima koje vodite: šaljite privatne poruke, izbacite članove

string.name: followRead
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third-party software to view (read) which players you are following.

resources.string: Čitajte praćene igrače

string.name: followWrite
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third-party software to follow and unfollow other players on your behalf.

resources.string: Pratite i prestanite pratiti druge igrače

string.name: msgWrite
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third-party software to send messages on your behalf.

resources.string: Pošaljite privatnu poruku drugim igračima

string.name: boardPlay
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third-party software to play games using e-boards like DGT, through Lichess's board API.

resources.string: Igrajte partije s API-tablom

string.name: botPlay
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third-party software to play games over the bot API. This is intended mainly for having an engine account e.g. the accounts featured on https://lichess.org/player/bots

resources.string: Igrajte partije s API-botom
Pogledajte i koristite Vaš vanjski šahovski program
Kreirajte i ažurirajte vanjski šahovski program

string.name: webLogin
string.comment: In the context of an access token, a setting which permits third-party software to create authenticated sessions - meaning effectively unlimited access to your account, using it as if it is you, instead of a third party program. It will be unable to view your password but it will be able to do almost everything else.

resources.string: Kreirajte autorizirane sesije na veb-sajtu (omogućava puni pristup!)

string.name: webMod
string.comment: In the context of an access token, this is a setting which permits third-party software to use moderator tools on your behalf. Most players will not be able to see this option.

resources.string: Koristite moderatorske alate (u granicama Vaših dozvola)
